extendedInfo.description: Central Desktop's mobile application allows users to access and comment on all content stored within Central Desktop workspaces. - The recent activity stream includes the most recent account activity including file uploads, updates and comments. - Dashboard views for "My Calendar" and "My Tasks" give quick view of upcoming meetings and deadlines. - The workspaces menu lists all of your workspaces by alphabet, shortcut or recently viewed. - View and comment on files, documents, tasks, milestones, databases, events, status updates, comments and discussions stored within your workspaces. - All of your favorites and recently viewed items are easily accessed from the Favorites menu. - Search all of your workspaces with Central Desktop's powerful full text search. - The collaborators menu is an easy way to find and contact your collaborators, coworkers or partners when you are away from your desk.

reviews.title: OK as a viewer
reviews.comment: Cant upload files or pictures from the field. Wont exit or close the program with the back button. Can only get out with the home key.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Way to exit..
reviews.comment: Not fond of using it.. if its a readonly app and which never allows me to EXIT....
reviews.author: chandrakanth ch

reviews.title: Perfect for viewing projects whilst out and about
reviews.comment: Works well and nice and simple. If you need more than an overview the log on to the Web server. Those with issues logging on need to disable predictive text to do so. Save password etc then enable it again. Overall does exactly what I need an app to do it good job CD.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awful platform
reviews.comment: Hard to navigate. Very limited capability to performance actions within app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Poor considering the time the app has been out. We need access to tasks we assigned to others. Need to be able to assign tasks across workspaces and to others.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Of no use at this time...
reviews.comment: Can\'t log in to app, crazy zooming issue on home screen, can\'t select the password field, can\'t see the username field. Samsung G. S II.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good start
reviews.comment: I agree - login screen is jumpy, but it works. Interface is clean and well organized. Looking fwd to increased functionality; most is view only.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Login screen buggy
reviews.comment: From the moment it opened on my Desire HD the bugs were obvious. The login screen jumps around when the keyboard is displayed on screen. Fix please!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Decent interface. Definitely need the ability to track time on individual projects. That would make the app complete for our team.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Can\'t exit the app after the update, back button should exit if you are on the home screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally a mobile version.
reviews.comment: I\'ve been waiting for a mobile app for a while. The website has a lot more features, but the app works better on a phone.
reviews.author: A Google User
